document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of the subgenus Quedius (Raphirus) Stephens (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini: Quediina) with descriptions of four new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy of the subgenus Quedius (Raphirus) Stephens (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini: Quediina) with descriptions of four new species from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Measurements. BL = 11.8 mm , BW = 2.5 mm , HL/PL/EL = 1.00: 1.50 : 1.63 , HW/PW/EW/AW = 1.00: 1.39 : 1.53 : 1.45 , HW/HL = 1.17 , HEL /HTL = 4.58 , PW/PL = 1.09 , EW/EL = 1.10 , ESL/EL = 0.53 . Distribution.
Quedius herbicola Smetana
is widely distributed in China (Chongqing, Hubei, Guizhou and Zhejiang Province). The present specimens of
Quedius herbicola Smetana
were collected from northern Guizhou Province at an altitude of 1100 m .
